name: International Society for Underground Freight Transportation
goal:
The objectives of ISUFT are:
1) To seek expanded use of UFT for societal benefits.
2) To promote public awareness in the capability and benefits of UFT.
3) To encourage research in UFT.
4) To encourage educational programs in UFT at universities and other educational institutions.
5) To provide an international forum in which developments of UFT technologies throughout the world can be communicated via conferences, symposia, websites, newsletters, lecture courses, etc.
6) To organize and offer an ISUFT conference or symposium every two to three years.
interests: Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU initatives related to transport and mobility, particurlarly  when it concenrs technology or process innovation initiatives, like research and demonstration projects.
